#summary A quick guide to getting started to analysis in itSimple tool.
#sidebar TableContents

= Analysis =

1. Let's analyze our State Machines using Petri Nets. Click Petri Net Tab
2. Click over project.
3. Click State Machine Diagram
4. Click Build Option.
5. Here it is the Analysis results based on the actions.
6. Click run option, the transitions have green color.
7. Look at the actions.
8. Select all State Machine Diagrams.
9. Now click Build option.
10. You can look at the Petri Net Diagram. All state machine is appear in the Petri Net Diagram.
11. You can launch all enabled transitions
